name: Zon Token
description: Zon is a digital token with global reach, powering multiple utilities with one token. Profit-Sharing: The Profits generated by ZON and its ecosystem Dapps flow back to the ZON holders. Versatile Utility: Supports governance, staking, and ecosystem service access, making it a multifaceted token. Cross-Chain Compatibility: Seamlessly moves across different blockchains, enhancing usability and accessibility. Deflationary Model: Limited supply ensures stability and potential value appreciation over time. Integrated Ecosystem: Embedded in GameFi and DEFI Dapps with profits going back to ZON holders.
